channel.title: Posts on Zachary Baker
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Zachary Baker

item.title: Universe's Athenaeum
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Universe's Athenaeum The Universe's Athenaeum The Universe's Athenaeum contains everything that has been written, will be written, and could be written. Well, at least things with a length of less than 856. The possible characters are the lowercase alphabet, the comma, the period, and the space. So how many books are there in this athenaeum? Well with 29 possible characters and ~855 characters in one book, there are 29^855 books.

item.title: Encompas
item.description: Encompas Go to encompas.tech to view our site which is hosted via GitHub Pages Inspiration In a world where a persons values define how they live, being able to accurately determine your stance on world issues is vital. We immediately noticed that all the current quizzes that help determine your stance are extremely outdated, vague, or inaccurate. What it does Encompas allows users to vizualize where they stand on the political compass via a 4d graph.

item.title: The Effect of Location on Number of Lyme Disease Cases
item.description: The Effect of Location on Number of Lyme Disease Cases By Zachary R. Baker and Srishanth Tangedipalli Thomas Jefferson High School for Science and Technology Dr. Kathleen Morrow, Ms. Erinn Harris, and Ms. Julia Litchford Introduction Lyme Disease has had over 25,000 cases every year in the US since 2007 (Monaghan et al, 2015). It is a vector-borne disease, which means that it is transmitted to humans and other animals by blood-feeding animals, such as ticks or mosquitos.
